text: I feel pretty shit and I am in a bit of a funk, how do I get myself out of this?
I don't feel connected to my partner, how can we change this?
I hate my job, how do I find something that I like doing?
I don't feel like I have a purpose.
I don't feel motivated to do anything at the moment, how do I change this?
I want a deeper relationship with my partner and friends, how do I do this?
I suffer from anxiety, it's soul crushing and it stops me from doing the things I love.
I'm burnt out from my job and don't know what to do about it
